## Dataset.type property

The type of the chart, such as 'line' or 'column'.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type: "line" | "stepline" | "bar" | "column" | "lollipop" | "histogram" | "scatter" | "heatmap" | "pie" | "donut" | "graph";
```
